content: Hi all, was working on an IG and was wondering if anyone knows what the base URL should be for referring to resources in R4B. For example, the version-pinned reference to Bundle is: http://hl7.org/fhir/R4/bundle.html. Will R4B just use the same /R4/ segment, since it's a point release of R4, or will there be a different segment (e.g., /R4B/)?
@Gino Canessa R4B is not a point release of R4. It's possible for some servers to treat it as such, but not others . It will be /R4B/
Fair on the URL, but the version is going to be 4.3.0, right?
